title: Need Help Moving?
posting_body: Need help moving out or into a new place, apartment, condo, house, storage unit, etc?
Need help moving a single item; couch, bed, mattress, washer, dryer, refrigerator, hutch, table, armoire etc?
I have a 10 foot box truck and can help with your moving needs.
Very affordable.
$60/hr + gas + travel time if not local to San Mateo.
Cash
Text move date, pickup & drop off city locations.
Will get back within the hour.
Thanks,
Doug: 650
